timeline.author: codeclimate

timeline.message:
Combine server side websockets

This update combines all server side websockets into just two. The two websocket
connections are based on the expected source of connections, ie: players or games.

This updates the server side design for websockets to be source based rather than
topic based.  Going forward this means we will likely only have two websocket
endpoints in the long run.
